entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
